SELECT p.patent_doc_id,p.app_no,p.patent_type,p.create_time,p.last_update_time,p.patent_name, p.manual,p.right_claim,p.abstract_desc,p.abstract_img,p.patent_doc_attachment_file,p.patent_doc_url, ps.patent_doc_status_id,ps.patent_doc_status_desc FROM patent_documents p LEFT JOIN patent_doc_status ps ON p.patent_doc_status =ps.patent_doc_status_id WHERE p.patent_doc_id IN (SELECT patent_doc FROM user_patent_docs WHERE user_id = #{userId}) ORDER BY create_time DESC ,last_update_time DESC limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
